price: 8. Ils veulent, de leurs seules bouches, éteindre la lumière d’Allah ; or Allah accomplira (la manifestation) de Sa lumière, quelque dépit qu’en aient les mécréants.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَٱللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna liyuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wal-lahu mutimmu nūrihi walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
